divs: Sighting DetailsAt first it was one light that was moving rapidly across the sky. After a few moments it was noticed that there where 3 lights in a triangular formation that incressed and decressed speed periodically. Object began to slow as it seemed to hover over the city. Far away, but seemed very large with very faint outlines.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: appeared to be a triangluar shape something that sped up and slowed down
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Warren
There were no other sightings in Warren on or around May 29th 2012
